#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define lld long long int
using namespace std;

lld GCD(lld a, lld b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    else
        return GCD(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{
    lld cases;
    lld n,m,ans;
    cin>>cases;
    while(cases--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cin>>m;
        if(n==1 && m==1)
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else if(n==1)
            cout<<m<<endl;
        else if(m==1)
            cout<<n<<endl;
        else
        {
            ans = GCD(n-1,m-1);
            cout<<ans+1<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
